it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.controller

Class ReloadController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.controller.ReloadController

  • class ReloadController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the reload action of a player, checking if he can reload and the way to pay the price to reload his weapons.
    Author:
    Francesco Nicotera.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<ColorOfCard_Ammo> colorsNotEnough
      The list of the colors of which the player has not enough ammo.
      (package private) Controller controller
      The reference of the controller.
      private boolean doesntWantToReloadAnymore
      It's true if the player has chosen that he doesn't want to reload anymore, false otherwise.
      (package private) Game game
      The reference of the game.
      private boolean isReloadingAtTheEndOfAction
      It's true if the reload is at the end of the turn like in the normal mode, false if is before to shoot as happens during the frenzy mode.
      private java.util.ArrayList<PowerUpCard> powerUpToDiscardToPay
      The list of power up cards usable to pay discarding them.
      private WeaponCard weaponCardToReload
      The weapon card to reload.

        The list of power up cards usable to pay discarding them.

      • isReloadingAtTheEndOfAction

        private boolean isReloadingAtTheEndOfAction
        It's true if the reload is at the end of the turn like in the normal mode, false if is before to shoot as happens during the frenzy mode.

        The weapon card to reload.

    • Method Detail

      • isThisWeaponReloadable

        boolean isThisWeaponReloadable(WeaponCard weaponCard)
        Check if a weapon is reloadable with the ammo and power up cards that is owner owns.
        Parameters:
        weaponCard - Weapon card that player could want to reload.
        Returns:
        True if the weapon is reloadable, false otherwise.

      • playerCanReload

        boolean playerCanReload(Player player)
        Check if a player can reload checking if there is at least one weapon reloadable.
        Parameters:
        player - Player that could want to reload.
        Returns:
        True if the player can reload, false otherwise.

      • sendRequestToReload

        void sendRequestToReload(Player player,
                         boolean isReloadingAtTheEndOfAction)
        Sends the request to reload after to have checked that the player really can.
        Parameters:
        player - Player that could want to reload.
        isReloadingAtTheEndOfAction - True if the reload is at the end of the action, false otherwise.

      • handleRequestToReloadWeapon

        void handleRequestToReloadWeapon(Player player,
                                 WeaponCard card)
        Handles the request by the client to reload a weapon.
        Parameters:
        player - Player owner of the weapon to reload.
        card - Weapon card to reload.

      • handleTheEndOfReload

        private void handleTheEndOfReload(Player player)
        Handles the end of the reload phase when there are no more weapon reloadable or the player has decided to not reload anymore.
        Parameters:
        player - Player that has completed the reload action.

      • sendRequestToDiscardPowerUpCard

        private void sendRequestToDiscardPowerUpCard(Player player,
                                             java.util.ArrayList<ColorOfCard_Ammo> colorsNotEnough)
        Sends the request to discard a power up card to pay the price of reload of a weapon.
        Parameters:
        player - Player that is trying to reload a weapon.
        colorsNotEnough - List of colors of which there are not enough ammo.

      • sendPlayerBoardEventAfterReload

        private void sendPlayerBoardEventAfterReload(Player player)
        Sends the player board event after a successfully reload.
        Parameters:
        player - Player that has done the reload.

      • handleDiscardOfPowerUpCard

        void handleDiscardOfPowerUpCard(DiscardPowerUpCard event)
        Handles the discard of the power up card chosen by the player to pay the price of the weapon card.
        Parameters:
        event - Event generated by the client.
